name: Tsukuyomi
temple_description:
One of the Three Great Goddesses in Japanese mythology. She symbolizes the deification of the moon, the Goddess in charge of the night, and the ruler of the lunar eclipse.
She was a compatriot of the Great Goddess Amaterasu, having assisted her in knowing everything there is in the world. Later, due to an incident, she broke up with Amaterasu, and the Sun and the Moon have been separated ever since.

active_skills.name: Tsukuyomi
active_skills.effect: Inflicts [Ignite], causes the enemy to lose 4% of current HP for 2 rounds

active_skills.name: Moon God's Arrow
active_skills.effect: Attacks 2 times randomly, each dealing 150% P.DMG
